TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit PaperSource extends System.Object

Docs.summary: 指定印表機取得紙張的紙匣。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個類別由<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrinterSettings.PaperSources%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PageSettings.PaperSource%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性來取得紙張來源紙匣可用印表機上，並分別設定頁面的紙張來源。
如需列印的詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Drawing.Printing>命名空間的概觀。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會填入`comboPaperSource`下拉式方塊的印表機支援的紙張來源。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A>識別要透過加入項目提供的顯示字串的屬性為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>下拉式方塊的屬性。 這個範例需要<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>名為變數`printDoc`存在且特定的下拉式方塊已存在。
[!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表顯示 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource> 類別執行個體的初始屬性值。
|屬性|Initial value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A>|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom?displayProperty=nameWithType>| |<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A>|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=nameWithType>|

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Kind As PaperSourceKind
public: property int RawKind { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.RawKind : int with get, set

Docs.summary: 取得或設定整數，表示其中一個 值或自訂值。
Docs.value: 整數值，表示其中一個 值或自訂值。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 下表顯示每個整數值<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>成員。 大於 256 對應到任何項目<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom>中<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind>列舉型別，但<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.RawKind%2A>屬性會傳回實際的整數值。
|整數值|PaperSourceKind 成員| |-------------------|----------------------------| |1|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Upper>| |2|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Lower>| |3|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Middle>| |4|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Manual>| |5|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Envelope>| |6|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.ManualFeed>| |7|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.AutomaticFeed>| |8|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.TractorFeed>| |9|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.SmallFormat>| |10|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.LargeFormat>| |11|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.LargeCapacity>| |14|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Cassette>| |15|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.FormSource>| |256 或更大|<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSourceKind.Custom>|

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SourceName { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SourceName : string with get, set

Docs.summary: 取得或設定紙張來源的名稱。

remarks.format:
## Remarks 當需要顯示紙張來源，請呼叫這個屬性。 紙張來源的名稱會產生根據<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.Kind%2A>屬性。
## Examples 下列程式碼範例會填入`comboPaperSource`下拉式方塊的印表機支援的紙張來源。 <xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PaperSource.SourceName%2A>識別要透過加入項目提供的顯示字串的屬性為<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListControl.DisplayMember%2A>下拉式方塊的屬性。 這個範例需要<xref:System.Drawing.Printing.PrintDocument>名為變數`printDoc`存在且特定的下拉式方塊已存在。
[!code-cpp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CPP/source.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/CS/source.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/PaperSource and PaperSize Example with Resolution/VB/source.vb#2)]
